data.title: NOVAR 2600
data.meta_description: power factor correction, power quality and energy eficiency applications in industry, smart grids and generation.
data.text:
Production have been discontinued in 12/2021. New orders are no longer accepted. For alternatives see NOVAR 2400 or NOVAR 2700.

The NOVAR 2600 is a new high-end model of the innovated NOVAR 2000 power factor controller line built on a powerful modern platform shared among all the recent instruments. The fast three-phase power factor controller incorporates a multi-functional panel meter, data logger, and power quality analyzer.

A SCADA system can remotely supervise and control the cabinet operation over the Ethernet or RS485 communication port. The Ethernet option offers native support for a web server, Modbus TCP, network management and network time protocols, and other usual network features. Manipulation with instrument data and configurations can be restricted only to authorized users, while the PFC can encrypt all communication payload.

NOVAR 2600 shares its key features and parameters with NOVAR 2100, NOVAR 2200, and NOVAR 2400 controllers.

Key features
